duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide assessment, assistance, and support of infant nutrition, particularly breastfeeding, to infants, adult and adolescent mothers, and families.
Provide education to staff and physicians, as well as to the community.
Work closely with physicians and staff, and promote collaboration and communication.
Participate effectively in the daily operations of both inpatient and outpatient care.

education_certification.credential: BSN or Bachelor’s degree in related field preferred.
Current applicable Lactation Consultant state license.
IBCLC Certification through the International Board of Lactation Consultant Examiners (IBCLE) and recertification through IBCLE required every 5 years.
